LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.CombatMaster.Label: Combat Master
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.CombatMaster.Descrip: Master of both offense and defense in Qi combat techniques.
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.HealerWarrior.Label: Healer Warrior
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.HealerWarrior.Descri: A warrior who can heal and fight with enhanced physique.
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.GrandMaster.Label: Grand Master
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.GrandMaster.Descript: Master of multiple Qi cultivation techniques with enhanced abilities.
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.IronMaster.Label: Iron Master
LanguageData.TuTien.SkillSynergy.IronMaster.Descripti: Ultimate defensive master with unbreakable body and healing prowess.
